WorkItem.Description:
First... thanks for this great work... touchless sdk is a very good, simple and helpful sdk.
we build a litte reaction test with touchless.
i dont want to say any more... just test it :-D
 
you will find a demo video and the programm on my website.
 
http://www.little-devil.de/
 
thanks to: sven hasan und murat, 
they are mainly responsible for planing and building this project with me
 
have a lot of fun with it
greetings from germany
 
mathias
